extendedInfo.description: Do you have what it takes to become a legendary Powered hero? In "Heroes Rise," Powered heroes have become the ultimate celebrities, and you dream of joining the A-Listâbut to get there, you'll first have to take down evil Powered gangs, compete with deadly rivals, choose a worthy sidekick, team up with famous champions, and prove to all of Millennia City that you're a true hero. "Heroes Rise: The Prodigy" is an interactive novel where you control the main character. In each chapter, your choices determine how the story proceeds. Will you play as male or female? Gay or straight? Crusade for justice, or gun for money? Will you work as a team with the world-famous Millennial Group, or will you steal their spotlight?How high will your hero rise?

reviews.title: Captivating story
reviews.comment: Great game and well worth the money, best of type. Pay play and fun.
reviews.author: antonio torres

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: In the past week I\'ve been reafinh alot of the choice of books but this one is by far the most engaging and in depth one. Very well done absolutely amazing
reviews.author: Emmanuel Powell-clark

reviews.title: Well written.
reviews.comment: This is very well written, but less interactive than other games from choice of games.  I would strongly recommend this game to anyone who likes IF, just realize it is slightly linear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Love These Games!
reviews.comment: This game was perfect in everyway! I was deeply immersed in the entire story and enjoyed every second. It is really worth the money! I really hope they come put with a second part,I loved it that much!
reviews.author: Brittany Gordon

reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW
reviews.comment: This games is worth. The money but it I played 20 times and am not bored with AMAZING GAME
reviews.author: Garrett Pugh

reviews.title: 5 Stars!!
reviews.comment: Wow this is by far the best Choice of story it was long in depth and left me wanting more please hurry with the second part!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I never write reviews
reviews.comment: But this game was well worth the 2$ I spent on it.  I have played most of the choice games and this one was by far the best.  It was very thought out and had only a few grammatical errors.  Though I almost chose 4stars because many of the choices it seems really change the outcome more your characters attitude towards the situation.  Over all great read though.
reviews.author: Jay Worster

reviews.title: Great story!
reviews.comment: Really enjoyable storyline and plot twists, can\'t wait for the next installment! Definitely something I\'d purchase :) It\'d be nice for my character to have more romantic options though, instead of just the one character Black Magic (I chose straight) still kept me immersed though!
reviews.author: Lily Nguyen

reviews.title: This was AMAZING!!!
reviews.comment: This is probably my new favorite. Well worth the money to play. Definitely hope a sequel comes out to continue on with my character. That would be awesome. Keep it up. Make more games!!
reviews.author: Angel Fuller

reviews.title: Love it can\'t wait for new part!
reviews.comment: I can\'t wait for a new part! Its a great game every one should try!
reviews.author: James Flora

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Best of the choice of series imo but would like to see a bit more character/relationship dev, looking forward to future episodes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The story, setting, characters. A real treat to read. Don\'t let the price fool you. Its worth it.
reviews.author: Tyrone Pantera

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love your games and this one was your best one yet. Super in-depth and engaging story and interesting characters. I wish there were a bit more of Black Magic storyline in the middle-end parts because it tapered off drastically after you find his/her secret. Other than that small foible, brilliant work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: Absolutely the best Choice game, and I\'ve played them all, times over. It was full of depth, inspiration, and had choices that really made you think and struggle to decide. I was so impressed and thoroughly satisfied. I cannot wait for the next installment. Please make it soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing...and understatement
reviews.comment: I always enjoy the role playing books...this one is worth the $. Im not much of a reader, but I know I\'ll redo my heroes story and go different directions each time. And its been hours of reading, and I haven\'t finished. Im actually taking the time out to give a 5star review. Please make more like this!!  A MUST HAVE A MUST READ
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Was unsure about paying for this at first, but thought why not I loved the free choice games,  The story is great and is really intresting, The brances that you have to pick from all give you the sence that your incontrol and never being pushed to one answer more than another, I say if you like text-based games 100% get this. Cant wait for the next installment
reviews.author: Raven WolfGang

reviews.title: My mind is blown
reviews.comment: I am completely and utterly astonished at how engaging this \'game\' is. The other choice of games have been great but this one truly stands out. I really feel like I AM the character. Anybody who passes this up is really missing out on one of the best game you\'ll ever find to date on a mobile device.
reviews.author: Devesh Kumar

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Really loved this! The story is immersive and original with plenty of interesting twists. The length is great - well worth the money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So good that i want a second one
reviews.author: Lee Wimberly

reviews.title: The worst of them all.
reviews.comment: Good concept - but lazy job, resulting in the worst of them all. Truly. Save your money. All the answers lead to the same place. This was a great disappointment, because the idea of heroes was a good one.
reviews.author: Ko Kuffuor
